llm_api_key.description: API key for the LLM provider

llm_model.description: Model name sent to the API (e.g. gpt-4o-mini, claude-3-haiku)

system_prompt.description: System prompt prepended to every conversation

counting_mode.description: How to count token usage: words, data_volume, or tokenizer

words_per_token.description: Words counted as 1 platform token (words mode)

mb_per_token.description: Megabytes counted as 1 platform token (data_volume mode)

tokens_per_token.description: LLM tokens counted as 1 platform token (tokenizer mode)

max_message_length.description: Maximum character length per user message

max_history_messages.description: Maximum number of history messages sent to the LLM
